title: Marketing Coordinator (Facebook Ads & Google Ads)
job_overview:
Are you a results-driven digital marketer who knows how to turn ad spend into real growth? We're looking for a Marketing Coordinator with a strong focus on Google Ads and Facebook Ads to join our team and help scale our paid media efforts.

In this role, you'll take the lead on planning, launching, and optimizing paid advertising campaigns across both platforms. You'll work closely with the President to align campaigns with our business objectives and ensure our messaging remains consistent and compelling. If you're highly analytical, creative, and love diving into performance metrics to improve results, this role is for you.

At ProRise, we believe there’s a better way to deliver residential and commercial painting services—one built on integrity, trust, and exceptional quality. Our customer-first approach has made us the most reviewed painting company in Canada, and we’re looking for someone who shares our passion for excellence and growth.

Position Overview:
The Marketing Coordinator plays a key role in supporting the planning, execution, and tracking of marketing initiatives across various channels. This role offers a dynamic environment with opportunities to contribute ideas, take ownership of projects, and grow professionally within the marketing field.

What You’ll Do:
Plan, launch, and optimize Facebook Ads and Google Ads campaigns to generate leads and boost awareness
Monitor campaign performance, analyze KPIs, and implement optimizations to drive results
Create content and visual assets for digital ads, landing pages, emails, and social media
Manage content calendars and maintain brand consistency across platforms
Coordinate marketing initiatives and ensure timely execution of digital campaigns
Conduct audience research and keyword targeting to maximize ROI and lead quality
Stay up to date with platform updates and digital advertising best practices
Work closely with leadership to align marketing strategy with business goals
Report on campaign performance and provide actionable insights

What You’ll Bring:
Proven success managing and optimizing Facebook Ads and Google Ads campaigns with measurable results
Strong understanding of digital marketing KPIs and analytics tools
Strong writing and storytelling skills, with the ability to adapt tone and voice for different platforms
Basic to advanced design skills using tools like Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar
Strong understanding of other major social platforms including Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube

Nice to Have:
Experience with email marketing platforms like Mailchimp or Sendlane
SEO knowledge and content optimization experience
Experience in landing page creation and sales funnel strategy

What We’re Looking For:
3+ years of experience managing Facebook and Google Ads campaigns
Strong understanding of paid media strategy, ad platforms, and performance tracking
Basic to advanced design skills using tools like Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar
Analytical mindset with experience using tools like Google Analytics, Ads Manager, etc.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously
Strong English communication (C2 level), attention to detail, and ability to prioritize tasks
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, Mailchimp, Google Analytics, or similar
Ability to track, interpret, and report on key performance metrics
Detail-oriented with strong organizational and time-management skills 
Collaborative team player with a proactive, self-motivated attitude

Non-Negotiables:
Hours of Operations: 8AM to 5PM Pacific Standard Time, Monday to Friday
A quiet environment to work in. Working from cafes is not allowed.
A computer with two monitors or laptop with 2nd screen
Headset with microphone
Mouse and keyboard
High speed internet connection (100Mbps+)

Other Detail:
Paid PH holidays and performance bonus
